tool_description: This API allows clients to verify the integrity and validity of a medical certificate issued by doctors registered with the Medical Council of India (MCI) and the National Medical Commission (NMC).

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request made to verify a medical certificate.

api_list.name: MCI / NMC Doctor Verification
api_list.description: Verifies the integrity and validity of a medical certificate. Use the GET Call API to fetch results using the request ID obtained in the response.
